quote: Whoever established the high road and how high it should be should be fired.
author: Sandra Bullock

quote: The suspense is terrible. I hope it’ll last.
author: Willy Wonka

quote: I like my money where I can see it: hanging in my closet.
author: Carrie Bradshaw

quote: Why do they call it rush hour when nothing moves?.
author: Robin Williams

quote: Don’t be so humble — you are not that great.
author: Golda Meir

quote: If you can’t be kind, at least be vague.
author: Judith Martin

quote: Always forgive your enemies; nothing annoys them so much.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: In real life, I assure you, there is no such thing as algebra.
author: Fran Lebowitz

quote: Accept who you are. Unless you’re a serial killer.
author: Ellen DeGeneres

quote: I’m not good at the advice. Can I interest you in a sarcastic comment?.
author: Chandler Bing

quote: As I learned from growing up, you don’t mess with your grandmother.
author: Prince William

quote: I’m not insane. My mother had me tested.
author: Sheldon Cooper

quote: Turn your face toward the sun and the shadows fall behind you.
author: Maori proverb

quote: I finish what matters and let go of what does not.
author: Unknown

quote: I tried starting a hot air balloon business, but it never took off.
author: Unknown

quote: I'm not arguing, I'm just explaining why I'm right.
author: Unknown
